text: Uzhel' ne vidish' ty, Kak oblaka Allakh peregonyayet, Potom soyedinyayet ikh, Potom ikh obrashchayet v tuchu, I vidish' ty, Kak iz yeye rasshchelin l'yetsya dozhd'. I s neba On nizvodit gory (oblakov), V kotorykh grad (khranitsya); On porazhayet im, kogo zhelayet, Yego otvodit On ot tekh, kto mil Yemu. Blesk molnii Yego Pochti lishayet zren'ya
